Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder and neck section of a red-brown pottery ribbed jar, the fabric is greyish in section, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and traces of a black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394173) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394173)
